WSUS03 KKCI 241344 
CHIV WS 241344 
SIGMET VICTOR 3 VALID UNTIL 241744 
SIGMET  
NE WY UT CO 
FROM BPI TO SNY TO 30ESE TBE TO BCE TO BPI 
OCNL SEV TURB BTN FL330 AND FL400. DUE TO WNDSHR ASSOCD WITH JTST 
AND MTN WV ACT. RPTD BY ACFT. CONDS CONTG BYD 1744Z.
==

WSUS05 KKCI 241344 
SLCV WS 241344

WY UT CO NE

AND MTN WV ACT. RPTD BY ACFT. CONDS CONTG BYD 1744Z.
